response.original_title: Lady Gaga Live at Coachella 2025 Presents: "Mayhem in the Desert" - The Art of Personal Chaos
response.overview: Lady Gaga's 2025 Coachella performance, titled "MAYHEM in the Desert," is being widely praised for its ambitious and immersive production. The setlist, divided into four acts, features a mix of her new material from the "Mayhem" album and some of her biggest hits, all presented within a theatrical narrative of Gaga battling the "Mistress of Mayhem" for control of the stage.
response.title: Lady Gaga Live at Coachella 2025 Presents: "Mayhem in the Desert" - The Art of Personal Chaos
